# wcs-dropdown-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

You must add `wcs-dropdown-item` to `wcs-dropdown`

## Events

| Event                  | Description                                     | Type                |
| ---------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `wcsDropdownItemClick` | Event emitted when the dropdown item is clicked | `CustomEvent<void>` |


## Slots

| Slot                                                 | Description |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `"<no-name> the slot that contains the item's name"` |             |
